topic.title: PERSON DEATH YEAR AND MONTH (POST DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE)
topic.shortdesc: For the National Neonatal Data Set - Two Year Neonatal Outcomes Assessment, PERSON DEATH YEAR AND MONTH (POST DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE)Â is submitted instead of PERSON DEATH DATE (POST DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE), where the data set record is anonymised.
